channel.title: Hi-Jacked Account
channel.description:
***Formerly Known As USMC.***
I really can't be arsed to go into it all but, some turkish hacker fags SQL exploted my forums over at drewley.net.. They decrypted the MD5 hash, showing my raw password, this was then passed onto home & bigfish. I don't have a clue who posted that shit confession, none of it is true... Now my account is banned and im kinda pissed about the whole thing...

item.title: Hi-Jacked Account
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“Whitehat, post:1, topic:14504”]Formerly Known As USMC.

I really can’t be arsed to go into it all but,
some turkish hacker fags SQL exploted my forums over at drewley.net…
They decrypted the MD5 hash, showing my raw password,
this was then passed onto home & bigfish.
I don’t have a clue who posted that shit confession, none of it is true…
Now my account is banned and im kinda pissed about the whole thing…[/quote]

LAWL I love the turkish hackers, seen them all over the place, they love to use perl exploits

Google Rictoo That’s one of the Forums they hacked, but I ‘un-hacked’ =/

Edit: Shit, someone re-hacked it xD Time to unhack again ;D
Edit2: K, unhacked again -.-

Read full topic
